snippet: The Costello family abandoned the frenzy of New York City for a slower pace. But life in a storied pink house in the Garden District of New Orleans is its own kind of crazy.
abstract: Photographer Paul Costello decided to escape chaos of New York City life by moving his family to New Orleans and renovating a storied Gothic Italianate house in the city's Garden District.
lead_paragraph: The Costello family abandoned the frenzy of New York City for a slower pace. But life in a storied pink house in the Garden District of New Orleans is its own kind of crazy.

headline.main: For the Costellos, a Gentle Chaos
